summary: A fancy dancy re-texture of Calyps\' Imperial Investigator Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Imperial Investigator Re-Texture
Author - DreamBurrow
Orignal Mesh - calyps

--------------------------
Description:

X\'D Hello Hello!! 

This is a re-texture I made for the Imperial Investigator Armor!! 
By calyps

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19377

All Coats are now Re-textured, Hazzah!
Please leave lots of love on the original. 
If you would like to see the coats in a certain color, you may send me a request :D.

There are two variations. 
The fancy pants one, with the pattern on the pants and gloves.
And the Non-fancy pants one, only the coat has design. 

Be sure to submit some of your own beautiful characters wearing this re-texture! 

None of my followers are up for download at this time. Please don\'t ask for their files. 
Elf ears are from here::
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13173

Awesome Video By Hodilton
[youtube]6ZKgIVEqhYo[/youtube]

Another Great Vid By ModSkyrim.
[youtube]PuwaJY5BEUw[/youtube]

Thanks to everyone who download. 
Enjoy!

--------------------------
Installation: 

First Install Calyps Imperial Investigator armor!! 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19377

Copy all content to the Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------------------
Uninstallation: 

Remove the following folders:

Data\\textures\\calyps\\roscoat\\

Or uninstall using NMM. 


---------------------------

Known Issues:

Poor quality. Nothing I do will ever be perfect, sorry D:.
---------------------------
Permissions:
DO NOT upload any of my works with out my expressed permission. Thank you. 
I do not give permissions to upload my works on Steam, whatsoever. 
---------------------------

Credits:

Bethesda - Skyrim

Calyps - For being so kind to allow me to release this re-texture for her amazing armor!
author: DreamBurrow
